reviews.text: If you need to get a train to somewhere from Weybridge, this is the place to go!! Docked a couple of stars because there's no trains on Sundays and they don't have a swimming pool :/

Toilets locked ..tried the door but it was locked a station employee came behind me and said “locked today because no staff” I replied “ so what should people do?” She had no official or biological answer ..humans need water thus need the call of nature ..if someone uses a wall they get arrested ..this is far too typical at rail stations and trains

I cried the whole way to the station, but it is my own reason for a big malicious joke from life. And missing a person that we are going to finish the stories. I will remember this place for life time.
Bery effishent relway sarvice I oftan came with the femily and frends

Good train station with great quick links to addlestone and chertsey. It has two car parks wich are able to fit a lot of cars. An enjoyable five ish second lift journey. There are two bus stops which become handy when the trains are on strike. The station is in a good walking distance from the heart of weybridge and a very quick drive. The station has a taxi pick up and drop of section which is handy to keep the traffic flowing. Speaking of traffic around that area traffic starts building up at 8:00 am and is pretty much scilent at 10:00 am. But the traffic stars building up at 3:00 pm and doesn't go scilent for another couple of hours on weekdays. So all in all great train station.
